duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop workplace wellbeing strategies aligned with organizational objectives and measure employee wellbeing.
Evaluate workplace wellbeing programs and initiatives, staying up to date on external campaigns and Employee Value Proposition strategies.
Monitor crisis alert system and proactively address safety events to ensure the safety and support of employees.
Develop and maintain Employee Value Proposition and employee recognition program in partnership with key stakeholders.
Develop training modules, educate, and train employees on employee health, safety, and security.
Participate in corporate employee health and safety compliance and prepare quarterly reporting.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Employee Health and Safety, Employee Experience, or related field (Master's preferred)
